replies.message: Lol xD people get up set when we dump water on the ground where it will  go back into the soil and go back into the natural underground water veins, yet we bottle water every day in America, which in turn polluted our land from the discarded plastic. Seriously people get your shit together

If you don't want to "waste water" then donate the $100 and save water. Better yet STFU and donate an additional $100 to cleanwater.org if you're so concerned. It will go a lot farther than you sitting on a computer wasting energy making dumb meme's!

Oh shit sorry man want me to ship some water to Africa so you feel better?

It doesn't work like that.
So shut the fuck up.
U guys r doing wrong.. U are doing this as fun not as donating or supporting.. Some of u maybe don't even know about what is ALS ...
Only 27% of 95 million will go to research
That means only 351,851 is going to charity well the rest goes to what?
